job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Our client is looking for an exceptional Backend Software Engineer with a strong background in developing high-performance, scalable software solutions tailored for Kubernetes-based, cloud-native environments and distributed systems. In this role, you will play a pivotal part in designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform that caters most modern LLM (Large Language Model) mission-critical applications.

   You will work on a range of cloud technologies such as streaming APIs, network protocols, and security best practices throughout the software stack.

   Job specifics:
     * Implement robust backend systems using the selected infrastructure frameworks and open-source.
     * Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams to ensure seamless integration with backend systems.
     * Drive comprehensive test coverage, instrumentation, and documentation., The Next Chapter W&S
   Gemeente:
   The Hague
   Contracttype:
   Vast contract, Voltijds
   Categorieën:
   Software Engineer, Back-End Developer
   Opleidingsniveau:
   Bachelor
   Master
   Gepubliceerd:
   24.11.2023
   Deel nu:
   Vind een job die bij jou past
job_details.full_text:
Backend (Cloud) Software Engineer

Our client is looking for an exceptional Backend Software Engineer with a strong background in developing high-performance, scalable software solutions tailored for Kubernetes-based, cloud-native environments and distributed systems. In this role, you will play a pivotal part in designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform that caters most modern LLM (Large Language Model) mission-critical applications.

   You will work on a range of cloud technologies such as streaming APIs, network protocols, and security best practices throughout the software stack.

   Job specifics:
     * Implement robust backend systems using the selected infrastructure frameworks and open-source.
     * Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams to ensure seamless integration with backend systems.
     * Drive comprehensive test coverage, instrumentation, and documentation., The Next Chapter W&S
   Gemeente:
   The Hague
   Contracttype:
   Vast contract, Voltijds
   Categorieën:
   Software Engineer, Back-End Developer
   Opleidingsniveau:
   Bachelor
   Master
   Gepubliceerd:
   24.11.2023
   Deel nu:
   Vind een job die bij jou past

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on backend software engineering for cloud-native environments and distributed systems, specifically mentioning integration with LLM applications. However, it lacks specific details about generative AI model development, fine-tuning, or advanced prompt engineering, which are core to the GenAI Engineer profile. While it mentions LLM applications, the emphasis is on the backend infrastructure and software development supporting them, rather than the AI modeling itself. It doesn't align with the core responsibilities of an ML Engineer either, as it's not focused on predictive modeling. Therefore, it falls under the 'Ambiguous' category due to its general nature and lack of specific AI engineering tasks.

job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes 'Backend Software Engineer', 'developing high-performance, scalable software solutions', 'designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform', 'Implement robust backend systems', and 'seamless integration with backend systems', all of which are core to software development.
The role involves building and maintaining cloud-native environments and distributed systems, which are fundamental aspects of backend software development.
job_tasks.phrase: developing high-performance, scalable software solutions tailored for Kubernetes-based, cloud-native environments and distributed systems

job_tasks.justification: The job explicitly states the goal is to design and construct a platform for 'modern LLM (Large Language Model) mission-critical applications', indicating software development to support AI applications.
job_tasks.phrase: designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform that caters most modern LLM (Large Language Model) mission-critical applications

job_tasks.justification: Mentioning 'streaming APIs, network protocols, and security best practices throughout the software stack' points to development tasks within the software engineering domain.
job_tasks.phrase: work on a range of cloud technologies such as streaming APIs, network protocols, and security best practices throughout the software stack

job_tasks.justification: Implementing backend systems using infrastructure frameworks is a direct software development task.
job_tasks.phrase: Implement robust backend systems using the selected infrastructure frameworks and open-source

job_tasks.justification: Collaboration with DevOps and front-end teams for integration is a common software development responsibility.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams to ensure seamless integration with backend systems

job_tasks.justification: Ensuring test coverage, instrumentation, and documentation are essential parts of the software development lifecycle.
job_tasks.phrase: Drive comprehensive test coverage, instrumentation, and documentation.

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'Kubernetes-based, cloud-native environments' and collaboration with 'DevOps' teams suggests involvement in operational aspects of deploying and managing software in the cloud.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams
